entity.name: Wilbur Ross
entity.description: US Secretary of Commerce Wilbur Ross

text: @GOP @SecretaryRoss Confidence, for those who had it in Trump, is waning. It’s becoming abundantly clear, even to his base, that he’s master of deceit and a loser. Who would have ever believed the USA would lead the world in cases (over 2 million) and deaths (over 120 thousand) of coronavirus?
